The sound belongs at a railroad crossing in Kankakee, near the fatal Amtrak crash in Bourbonnais, Ill., said a local resident.
-- Rudy Giuliani, admitting that police officers should call men "sir," as long as it's clear they don't mean any actual respect by it.

Since 1991, the Transportation Department has reduced the number of these crossings from 290,000 to 257,000 and intends to close another 30,000.
